name: Verify that users can successfully sort the rules list based on the Active or  Active&Inactive status

steps.name: Given I open a browser and open RBAC Login page
When I click on sign in RBAC link
Then I enter the username and password to RBAC as tlsapp
Given Count the number of rules that are both active and Inactive before sorting
When Click on the status toggle
Then Count the number of rules that are in the list

fullName: UI test cases: Verify that users can successfully sort the rules list based on the Active or  Active&Inactive status
